povexport.ui.arcball
Class ArcBall

java.lang.Object
  povexport.ui.arcball.ArcBall

public class ArcBall
extends java.lang.Object

Supports the ArcBall and MouseWheel zoom manipulation of objects in processing based on code by Ariel Malka ArcBall quaternion concept by Ken Shoemake

Constructor Summary

          Default centered arcball and half width or half height whichever the smaller
